Records of the Office of External Affairs, Commencement and Special Events
Series IV. Commencement Prizes and Awards
Series IV. Commencement Prizes and Awards

This series includes files related to the creation, administration, and distribution of commencement prizes and awards given to staff and graduating students dating from 1941 to 2000. Files in this series typically contain correspondence, check request forms, and notes. Prizes and award titles include the Albert S. Borgman Memorial Prize Fund, Distler-Blankfort Award in Forensics, Distinguished Administrator Award, Distinguished Teaching Medal, and Wortis Biological Prize Fund.
